title: Font management application
content:
What font management application do you guys use?

I have for quite some time been using Linotypes Font Explorer because it was free. But i have never been very happy with it. So i have decided to switch over to something else, like Suitcase Fusion 2 or the newer Fontcase which have a nice iPhoto / iTunes layout, with some good preview features. But before i start paying for something, i would like to know what you prefer.

So what do you prefer?
author: steeze

comments.content: What is wrong with Font Explorer ?
